channel.title: [help me] how to add a page to profiles in SMF
channel.description:
I want to have it so I could add a page to profiles that only the admins and the user can use(to change extra settings I'm adding in) I saw about the sa allowed thing but can someone help me? I want to add the link to the page on the left nav bar while in the profile and It would still be in the profile, but just an added page. I find it hard to describe even though it seems so simple I don't need help making the page to change settings, but to just be able to add the page. I got far enough where it recognizes that the sa is the page, but I get this, and this has absolutely nothing to do with what I am trying to do. (after having to make a serperate file for the template(dunno why, it wouldn't load it if it was in the profile template..))
Database Error File: Line: Note: It appears that your database may require an upgrade. Your forum's files are currently at version SMF 1.1.3, while your database is at version 1.1.2. The above error might possibly go away if you execute the latest version of upgrade.php.
and I can't this "upgrade.php" in any of the forum's files.

item.title: [help me] how to add a page to profiles in SMF
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

then it is ixactly the same, a dump is the raw information, and restoring it, makes it exactly the same. It is just in my tests I get this error, it isn’t like anyone else does

Read full topic

@kloplop321 wrote:

I want to have it so I could add a page to profiles that only the admins and the user can use(to change extra settings I’m adding in)

I saw about the sa allowed thing but can someone help me?

I want to add the link to the page on the left nav bar while in the profile and It would still be in the profile, but just an added page.
